```{r data, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
df <- read.csv("C:/Users/wdy24/Dropbox (Personal)/BU_PHD/Coursework/BU MA series/MA575/Lab/Project/Code_dataset/dataset_Facebook(3).csv",header=T,sep=";")
df
attach(df)
```

```{r lm1}
summary(Lifetime.Post.Consumptions)
summary(Lifetime.Engaged.Users)
cor(Lifetime.Engaged.Users,Lifetime.Post.Consumptions)
df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Lifetime.Post.Consumptions, y = Lifetime.Engaged.Users)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  xlab("Lifetime Post Consumptions") + 
  ylab("Lifetime Engaged Users") 



LM_1 <- lm(df$Lifetime.Engaged.Users ~ df$Lifetime.Post.Consumptions)
summary(LM_1)
plot(LM_1)
confint(LM_1)
```

```{r lm fit}
LM <- lm(df$Lifetime.Engaged.Users ~ df$Lifetime.Post.Consumptions)
df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Lifetime.Post.Consumptions, y = Lifetime.Engaged.Users)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  xlab("Lifetime Post Consumptions") + 
  ylab("Lifetime Engaged Users") + 
  geom_smooth(method='lm', formula= y~x)

```
